Question_Text: What are the components of the Professional Development and Family Medicine Strand (PDFMS)?
System_Answer_Text: The components of the Professional Development and Family Medicine Strand (PDFMS) include competency focus on clinical skills, communication skills, population health and health system, information management, scientific basis of medicine, critical thinking and research, and professional values, attitudes, and ethics. The course structure includes teaching and learning methods such as lectures, small group discussions, tutorials, clinical settings, and assessments like portfolio assessments, OSCE, and MCQs.

Question_Text: What are the components of the Professional Development and Family Medicine Strand (PDFMS)?
System_Answer_Text: The components of the Professional Development and Family Medicine Strand (PDFMS) include professional development portfolio assessment, family medicine sequence, family medicine rotation OSCE, and family medicine professional development unit 5 assessment (MCQ, SEQ, OSCE).
